required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: an Istitution Experience on Parosteal OsTeosarcoma
clinical_study.official_title: Parosteal OsTeosarcoma: a Single Istitution Experience

brief_summary.textblock: single institution cases series review of histological and clinical data

detailed_description.textblock: Investigators will review all the cases with a diagnosis of primary parosteal osteosarcoma treated at the Rizzoli Institute from 1900 up to 31 July 2018, retrospectively.

primary_outcome.measure: retrospective analysis of cases of Parosteal osteosarcoma
primary_outcome.description: Investigators will exam the presence of progression (dedifferentiation) areas and the relationship of these factors to individual outcome.

study_pop.textblock: male and female with diagnosis of parosteal osteosarcoma treated at Rizzoli institute from 01 Jan 1900 to 31 Jul 2018

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female patients treated at Rizzoli Institute from 01 Jan 1900 to 31 Jul 2018
- Diagnosis of parosteal osteosarcoma
- Written informed consent prior to any study-specific analysis and/or data collection
Exclusion Criteria:
â€¢ Patients with histological diagnosis different from parosteal osteosarcoma

results_reference.citation: Han I, Oh JH, Na YG, Moon KC, Kim HS. Clinical outcome of parosteal osteosarcoma. J Surg Oncol. 2008 Feb 1;97(2):146-9.
Bertoni F, Bacchini P, Staals EL, Davidovitz P. Dedifferentiated parosteal osteosarcoma: the experience of the Rizzoli Institute. Cancer. 2005 Jun 1;103(11):2373-82.
Okada K, Frassica FJ, Sim FH, Beabout JW, Bond JR, Unni KK. Parosteal osteosarcoma. A clinicopathological study. J Bone Joint Surg Am. 1994 Mar;76(3):366-78.

Laitinen M, Parry M, Albergo JI, Jeys L, Abudu A, Carter S, Sumathi V, Grimer R. The prognostic and therapeutic factors which influence the oncological outcome of parosteal osteosarcoma. Bone Joint J. 2015 Dec;97-B(12):1698-703. doi: 10.1302/0301-620X.97B12.35749.

patient_data.ipd_description: No Individual Patient Data sharing plan has been implemented
